MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH3 postcode area of Edinburgh. We are aware of multiple power cuts in your area today and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on site working to repair an underground cable fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:36pm on Monday, 15 February 2021
